instruction: How does the performance of Deep Learning approaches compare to traditional univariate regression and Machine Learning methods in estimating alloying element concentrations in post-consumer aluminium scrap using quantitative Laser-Induced Breakdown Spectroscopy (LIBS) analysis?
Output: The performance of Deep Learning approaches in estimating alloying element concentrations in post-consumer aluminium scrap using quantitative Laser-Induced Breakdown Spectroscopy (LIBS) analysis is compared to traditional univariate regression and Machine Learning methods in terms of RMSE, MAE, and R2 value. The study found that the Deep Learning approaches outperformed the traditional methods in terms of these performance metrics.
